name: Super Mole Bro
description:
Play a mole on an epic treasure-hunt. You must dig deep to reach the treasures underground, but beware of the creatures hiding in the depths below!

Controls:
Cursor keys, Tab

Credits:
Peter Sperl - Graphics, Code
Simon Parzer - Code, Music, SFX, Graphics
Amelie Schneider - Level Design, Code

Game Engine: Godot 3.x
Tools: Visual Studio Code, Aseprite, LMMS, Audacity
